Name: Blue Riband
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A sweetened, blue-rinsed, orange and gin Martini.
History: The Blue Riband was awarded to the liner that made the fastest Atlantic crossing. This cocktail is thought to have been created on one of these ships.
Nutrition: One serving of Blue Riband contains 187 calories
